Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A $(this.appearance:body:type), $(this.appearance:hide:color) horse with a $(this.appearance:hair:color) mane and tail. This $(this.appearance:horse:gender) is a gelding. It is $(this.appearance:feet:type) and stands $(this.appearance:horse:height) hands high and is most suited for riding.
The back of this $(this.appearance:body:type) $(this.appearance:hide:color) horse. It includes the withers (between the shoulder bones near the base of the neck), the loins and croup.
A $(this.appearance:hide:color) gelding's belly, consisting of the brisket (lower chest) between and behind the legs and the girth of the stomach around which a saddle's cinch would be fitted.
The $(this.appearance:body:type) body of a $(this.appearance:hide:color) gelding, consisting of the chest, back, belly, sides and buttocks.
The {chest|breast} of a $(this.appearance:hide:color) gelding. This is the forward-facing area which lies below its neck and above its forelegs.
This $(this.appearance:hide:color) horse's $(this.appearance:ears:type) ear with tufts of hair on the inside to keep dirt out. It can lay flat or stand erect and alert.
This $(this.appearance:hide:color) gelding's $(this.appearance:ears:type) ears have tufts of hair on the inside to keep dirt out. They can lay flat or stand erect and alert.
This is the $(this.appearance:eyes:type) dark, eye of a gelding, with long eyelashes.
The horse has long sweeping, eyelashes.
The $(this.appearance:eyes:type), dark eyes of a $(this.appearance:horse:gender), with long eyelashes.
A pair of $(this.appearance:eyes:type), long-lashed gelding's eyes.
The $(this.appearance:hide:color) head of this gelding features a distinctive $(this.appearance:blaze:type) marking.

The forelegs of this $(this.appearance:hide:color) $(this.appearance:horse:type) are $(this.appearance:leg:length). They feature distinctive $(this.appearance:leg:type) markings. Inside the forelegs there is a rough patch, called a chestnut. Below the knees are the cannons, or shins of the lower foreleg, which end in a joint above the hoof called a fetlock.
The $(this.appearance:hide:color) $(this.appearance:horse:type)'s $(this.appearance:leg:length) forelegs. They feature distinctive $(this.appearance:leg:type) markings.

The $(this.appearance:hair:type), $(this.appearance:hair:color) forelock of a $(this.appearance:hide:color) $(this.appearance:horse:type), which extends forward from the front of the mane between the horse's ears.
The abbreviated genitals of a $(this.appearance:hide:color) gelding.

The head of a $(this.appearance:hide:color) gelding. It has two $(this.appearance:eyes:type) eyes, a soft pair of lips and muzzle, a distinctive $(this.appearance:blaze:type) marking the face, and two $(this.appearance:ears:type) ears separated by a forelock of $(this.appearance:hair:color) hair.
A $(this.appearance:hide:color) gelding's head with a distinctive $(this.appearance:blaze:type) marking.
The gelding is covered with a coat of short $(this.appearance:hide:color) hair.

The hind legs of this $(this.appearance:hide:color) palfrey are $(this.appearance:leg:length) and bear distinctive $(this.appearance:leg:type) markings. They include the buttocks and thighs, gaskins, and the hocks. Below the hocks are the cannons (shins of the lower foreleg), fetlocks and end at the hooves.
Two $(this.appearance:leg:length), $(this.appearance:hide:color) hind legs marked with distinctive $(this.appearance:leg:type) markings.

This is the hard hoof of a $(this.appearance:hide:color) $(this.appearance:horse:type). It is {grayish|gray|light gray} in color. It is $(this.appearance:feet:type). The underside of the hoof must be inspected often for stones and cuts that can cause lameness or other problems.
These are the hard hooves of a $(this.appearance:hide:color) palfrey. They are $(this.appearance:feet:type).

The left side of a $(this.appearance:body:type), $(this.appearance:hide:color) gelding, consisting of the shoulder above the foreleg, back along the chest area and ribs, and ending in the indentation of the flank, known as the stifle, an area just before the rear leg where, if ridden, spurs would be applied.
The left side of a $(this.appearance:hide:color) palfrey, consisting of the chest, ribs and flanks.
The $(this.appearance:hide:color) palfrey has a $(this.appearance:leg:type) marking on this leg.
A $(this.appearance:hide:color) palfrey's face bears a $(this.appearance:blaze:type) mark; the legs are distinguished by $(this.appearance:leg:type) markings.
The mouth of a $(this.appearance:hide:color) palfrey. Expert horse traders can tell the age by checking the teeth.
A palfrey's mouth, full of blunt teeth.
This $(this.appearance:hide:color) gelding's muzzle has two nostrils and a mouth.
This is the neck of a $(this.appearance:body:type), $(this.appearance:hide:color) palfrey with a $(this.appearance:hair:color) mane.
A gaping horse nostril, used for breathing.
Two horse nostrils, used for breathing.

The right side of a $(this.appearance:body:type), $(this.appearance:hide:color) gelding, consisting of the shoulder above the foreleg, back along the chest area and ribs, and ending in the indentation of the flank, known as the stifle, an area just before the rear leg where, if ridden, spurs would be applied.
The right side of a $(this.appearance:hide:color) gelding, consisting of the chest, ribs and flanks.

The $(this.appearance:hide:color) gelding has a $(this.appearance:hair:type), $(this.appearance:tail:type), $(this.appearance:hair:color) tail. It is useful for discouraging flies and other biting insects.
These are the blunt teeth of this horse, designed for chewing grass.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: ([ "appearance:blaze:type":(\{ "white star", "white stripe", "white blaze", "white snip", "white star-and-stripe", "white overall" \}), "appearance:body:type":(\{ "strong", "powerful", "plump", "svelte", "sleek", "well-muscled", "swaybacked" \}), "appearance:ears:type":(\{ "large", "fine", "delicate", "small", "ordinary", "shaggy", "proud" \}), "appearance:eyes:type":(\{ "large", "well-set", "wide-set", "gentle", "small", "normal", "deep-set", "proud", "soulful", "noble" \}), "appearance:feet:type":(\{ "shoed", "unshoed" \}), "appearance:hair:color":(\{ "black", "brown", "white", "chestnut", "gray", "dark-brown" \}), "appearance:hair:type":(\{ "long", "coarse", "braided", "thick", "thin", "trimmed" \}), "appearance:hide:color":(\{ "bay", "chestnut", "black", "dun", "brown", "gray", "dappled-gray", "roan", "piebald", "skewbald", "dark-brown", "golden-brown" \}), "appearance:horse:gender":(\{ "gelding", "mare" \}), "appearance:horse:height":(\{ "fifteen", "fourteen", "thirteen", "twelve" \}), "appearance:horse:type":(\{ "palfrey" \}), "appearance:leg:length":(\{ "long", "short", "well-proportioned", "average", "strong", "powerful", "spindly", "sinewy" \}), "appearance:leg:type":(\{ "white full-stocking", "white coronet", "white half-pastern", "white pastern", "white ankle", "white inside-heel", "white outside-heel", "white heel", "black leg" \}), "appearance:tail:type":(\{ "full", "lively", "glossy", "slightly drooping", "ordinary" \}) ])

Notes:Category.Notes:Note: Test horse for traitspawn and mounting
